examples.full_description: Apache User "apache" should belong to group "apache"

MySQL Command "mysql -h localhost -V" stdout should contain "5.1.73"
Tomcat Tomcat Daemon is listening on port 8080

examples.description: has a running service of tomcat
examples.full_description: Tomcat Tomcat Daemon has a running service of tomcat
Tomcat User "tomcat" should belong to group "tomcat"

expected `File "/opt/tomcat".directory?` to return true, got false
